summary: Wealthy Mrs. Khromova has a natural daughter, Musya, and an adopted daughter, Nata. The merchant Zhurov is in love with Nata, and hopes to marry her, but she is non-committal. When Zhurov ... See full summary Â»
cast: Olga Rakhmanova|Lidiya Koreneva|Vera Kholodnaya|Vitold Polonsky|Ivane Perestiani
title: Zhizn za zhizn
